values.name: OWNER
values.description: Discord ID of the bot's owner

values.name: TOKEN
values.description: Discord token (see. README.md) of the bot

values.name: HOST
values.description: IP-address to bind the host to (default is all interfaces)

values.name: MASTER
values.description: True, if this is the master bot (or the only one)

values.name: AUTOUPDATE
values.description: True, if we shall automatically update the bot on startup

values.name: AUTOBAN
values.description: True, if people leaving our discord should be automatically banned from the configured DCS-servers

values.name: SERVER_FILTER
values.description:
A regular expression to shorten server names (statistics only).
Can be used for better readabiliy
values.example: ^My Servers - will cut 'My Servers' from the beginning of each server name

values.name: MISSION_FILTER
values.description:
A regular expression to shorten mission names (statistics only).
Can be used for better readability.
values.example: \(.*\) - will remove everyhing in brackets from the mission names (like weather information)

values.name: DCS_HOME
values.description: DCS World server directories to install the bot's Hook files into

values.name: GREETING_MESSAGE_MEMBERS
values.description:
A greeting message for every known discord member  joining your DCS server. Will be displayed in chat.
First parameter ({1}) is the username, 2nd ({2}) the server name.

values.name: GREETING_MESSAGE_UNKNOWN
values.description:
A greeting message for every unknown user joining your DCS server. Will be displayed in chat.
First parameter ({1}) is the username, 2nd ({2}) the invite link to your discord.

values.name: INVITE_LINK
values.description: The invite link to your discord.
